name: thinkSMART Family
overview: A Puzzle Game for the whole family -Now the whole family can power up their minds and bodies And everyone can go head to head at your own level! -Over 8,000 exercises for well toned minds and bodies -Players establish their own “THINK” quotient and track their progress receiving expert evaluations throughout -Players can customize their own Avatars and enter the "Think Institute” to create their personalized daily plan -7 different categories: language comprehension, math, memory, logical and three-dimensional reasoning, readiness of mind and physical fitness -Includes puzzle games like Sudoku, Towers of Hanoi, Signal Boxes, Sort the Luggage and Mirror Image, absolutely free!" -Fun for up to 16 players in single and multi-player modes, Tournament, Competition and Endurance
